text: Yinci, wo wei yiselie de houyi guiding:“Chufei shi fuchou huo ping luan, fouze, fan wang sha yiren [zhu], ru sha zhongren; fan jiu huo yiren, ru jiu huo zhongren.” Wo de shizhemen que yi daizhe ming zheng daoda tamen. Ranhou, cihou tamen zhong dique you xuduo ren reng zai da dishang hengxingbadao.
